// Audio entry types

entry_types
{
	music
	{
		icon = "e_music";
		category = "Audio";
		colour = 255, 0, 255;
		detectable = 0;
	}

	midi_mus : music
	{
		name = "Music (MUS)";
		format = midi_mus;
		export_ext = "mus";
		editor = audio;
	}

	midi_smf : music
	{
		name = "Music (MIDI)";
		format = midi_smf;
		export_ext = "mid";
		editor = audio;
	}

	midi_xmi : music
	{
		name = "Music (XMI)";
		format = midi_xmi;
		export_ext = "xmi";
		reliability = 100;
		editor = audio;
	}

	midi_hmi : music
	{
		name = "Music (HMI)";
		format = midi_hmi;
		export_ext = "hmi";
		reliability = 100;
		editor = audio;
	}

	midi_hmp : music
	{
		name = "Music (HMP)";
		format = midi_hmp;
		export_ext = "hmp";
		reliability = 100;
		editor = audio;
	}

	midi_gmid : music
	{
		name = "Music (GMID)";
		format = midi_gmid;
		export_ext = "gmd";
		reliability = 75;
		editor = audio;
	}
	
	midi_rmid : music
	{
		name = "Music (RMID)";
		format = midi_rmid;
		export_ext = "rmi";
		reliability = 100;
		editor = audio;
	}

	mod_it : music
	{
		name = "Music (IT Module)";
		format = mod_it;
		export_ext = "it";
		editor = audio;
	}

	mod_xm : music
	{
		name = "Music (XM Module)";
		format = mod_xm;
		export_ext = "xm";
		editor = audio;
	}

	mod_s3m : music
	{
		name = "Music (S3M Module)";
		format = mod_s3m;
		export_ext = "s3m";
		editor = audio;
	}

	mod_mod : music
	{
		name = "Music (MOD Module)";
		format = mod_mod;
		export_ext = "mod";
		editor = audio;
	}

	mod_okt : music
	{
		name = "Music (OKT Module)";
		format = mod_okt;
		export_ext = "okt";
		editor = audio;
	}

	gme_ay : music
	{
		name = "Music (AY)";
		format = gme_ay;
		export_ext = "ay";
		editor = audio;
	}

	gme_gbs : music
	{
		name = "Music (GBS)";
		format = gme_gbs;
		export_ext = "gbs";
		editor = audio;
	}

	gme_gym : music
	{
		name = "Music (GYM)";
		format = gme_gym;
		export_ext = "gym";
		editor = audio;
	}

	gme_hes : music
	{
		name = "Music (HES)";
		format = gme_hes;
		export_ext = "hes";
		editor = audio;
	}

	gme_kss : music
	{
		name = "Music (KSS)";
		format = gme_kss;
		export_ext = "kss";
		editor = audio;
	}

	gme_nsf : music
	{
		name = "Music (NSF)";
		format = gme_nsf;
		export_ext = "nsf";
		editor = audio;
	}

	gme_sap : music
	{
		name = "Music (SAP)";
		format = gme_sap;
		export_ext = "sap";
		editor = audio;
	}

	gme_spc : music
	{
		name = "Music (SPC)";
		format = gme_spc;
		export_ext = "spc";
		editor = audio;
	}

	gme_vgm : music
	{
		name = "Music (VGM)";
		format = gme_vgm;
		export_ext = "vgm";
		editor = audio;
	}

	gme_vgz : music
	{
		name = "Music (VGZ)";
		format = gme_vgz;
		export_ext = "vgz";
		editor = audio;
	}

	sound
	{
		icon = "e_sound";
		category = "Audio";
		colour = 255, 0, 0;
		detectable = 0;
	}
	
	snd_doom : sound
	{
		name = "Sound (Doom Format)";
		format = snd_doom;
		reliability = 200;
		export_ext = "lmp";
		editor = audio;
	}
	
	snd_doom_mac : sound
	{
		name = "Sound (Mac Doom Format)";
		format = snd_doom_mac;
		reliability = 190;
		export_ext = "lmp";
		editor = audio;
	}
	
	snd_jaguar : sound
	{
		name = "Sound (Jaguar Format)";
		format = snd_jaguar;
		reliability = 100;
		export_ext = "lmp";
		editor = audio;
	}
	
	opl_imf : music
	{
		name = "IMF OPL File";
		format = opl_imf;
		reliability = 120;
		export_ext = "imf";
		editor = audio;
	}
	
	opl_imf_raw : music
	{
		name = "IMF OPL Data";
		format = opl_imf_raw;
		reliability = 60;
		export_ext = "imf";
		editor = audio;
	}
	
	opl_raw : music
	{
		name = "RDOS OPL File";
		format = opl_raw;
		reliability = 120;
		export_ext = "raw";
		editor = audio;
	}
	
	opl_dro : music
	{
		name = "DOSBox OPL File";
		format = opl_dro;
		reliability = 120;
		export_ext = "dro";
		editor = audio;
	}
	
	snd_wolf : sound
	{
		name = "Sound (Wolf3D PCM)";
		format = snd_wolf;
		match_name = "SND0*";
		match_archive = "archive_wolf";
		reliability = 10;
		export_ext = "swp";
		editor = audio;
	}
	
	snd_audiot : sound
	{
		name = "Sound (AudioT PC FX)";
		format = snd_audiot;
		reliability = 10;
		export_ext = "tpc";
		editor = audio;
	}
	
	opl_audiot : sound
	{
		name = "Sound (AudioT Adlib FX)";
		format = opl_audiot;
		reliability = 10;
		export_ext = "tad";
		editor = audio;
	}
	
	// This is used to interpret a raw sample
	snd_bloodsfx : sound
	{
		name = "Sound (Blood Format)";
		format = snd_bloodsfx;
		match_ext = "SFX";
		export_ext = "sfx";
		editor = audio;
	}

	snd_speaker : sound
	{
		name = "Sound (PC Speaker)";
		format = snd_speaker;
		export_ext = "lmp";
		reliability = 100;
		editor = audio;
	}

	snd_wav : sound
	{
		name = "Sound (Wav Format)";
		format = snd_wav;
		export_ext = "wav";
		editor = audio;
	}

	snd_voc : sound
	{
		name = "Sound (Creative)";
		format = snd_voc;
		export_ext = "voc";
		editor = audio;
	}

	snd_sun : sound
	{
		name = "Sound (Sun/NeXT)";
		format = snd_sun;
		export_ext = "snd";
		editor = audio;
	}

	snd_aiff : sound
	{
		name = "Sound (AIFF)";
		format = snd_aiff;
		export_ext = "aif";
		editor = audio;
	}

	snd_ogg : sound
	{
		name = "Sound (Ogg Vorbis)";
		format = snd_ogg;
		export_ext = "ogg";
		editor = audio;
	}

	snd_flac : sound
	{
		name = "Sound (FLAC)";
		format = snd_flac;
		export_ext = "flac";
		editor = audio;
	}

	snd_mp2 : sound
	{
		name = "Sound (MP2)";
		format = snd_mp2;
		export_ext = "mp2";
		editor = audio;
	}

	snd_mp3 : sound
	{
		name = "Sound (MP3)";
		format = snd_mp3;
		export_ext = "mp3";
		editor = audio;
	}
}
